post:
Two domains for sale

 - CENTOSFORUMS.COM
 - DEBIANTALK.COM

I registered those domains a while ago BUT I never got the time to officially launch them and invest time. My plan was to have CENTOSFORUMS.COM as UBUNTUFORUMS.COM or the likes since CENTOS has little platforms where there are plenty of experts

PM me your offers. I accept PAYPAL only at the moment. After successful payment, I can either push to Godaddy.com accounts OR give you auth code and unlock the domain names.
Unless I choose to close these earlier, the listings will be up for at least 4-5 days

Warm regards,


Asim
